hiveArticle.title: 400 Followers Giveaway - Up To 0.004 SBD For Active Followers!
hiveArticle.body:
![400.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmc4LaxpYDCEWuryRJtdvgYw4Xg8YS7ptFYwGQW9riWscK/400.jpg)

The terms of this giveaway are as follows:

Active followers can participate in any and all of the 4 following actions to take part in this giveaway:

1. Follow(ing) @auskiwi 0.001 SBD
2. Upvote this post: 0.001 SBD
3. Resteem this post: 0.001 SBD (please comment so I know you have resteemed)
4. Leave a comment below: 0.001 SBD (you will only be credited for 1 comment max)

Thanks so much to all my loyal Steemit followers,  and enjoy the free Steem Dollars!

PPS Here is another recent giveaway: https://steemit.com/giveaway/@auskiwi/august-1-free-0-001-sbd-giveaway
